member.name: T:Cenium.Framework.Data.Infrastructure.Query.QueryParser
member.summary: The QueryParser class takes a query string and parses it into a set of query conditions. The Apply method will apply the query to an IEnumerable as a set of Linq queries.

remarks.para: A query string is expressed in terms of property to evaluate, operator to apply and parameters on the form [property name]:[operator]([parameters]), for instance MyProperty:Equals(100). Each query expression is separated by ampersand (&).

The query parser will also evaluate sort order. Sort orders are expressed on the form [property name]:[direction] where direction is either asc or desc, for instance MyProperty:asc. Multiple sort order criterias are separated by ampersand (&). The direction qualifier is optional, if not specified ascending is assumed.

member.name: T:Cenium.Framework.Data.EntityAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a class is an entity type class.
member.remarks:
This attribute is used to identify classes that should be inspected upon generating services and component interfaces. When a class that has the EntityAttribute is encountered through inspection, a proxy class is generated.
Note that this attribute is not specific to data access - it simply means this is a class that may be serialized and used externally.

member.name: T:Cenium.Framework.Threading.AppLock
member.summary: Provides a mechanism that synchronizes distributed access to objects
member.remarks: The AppLock class is similar to DistributedLock; they both synchronize access across process and servers. The DistributedLock is intended for background jobs and can work across different threads where-as the AppLock is intended for locking user-initated processes within the same thread. You do not have to pre-define a lock identity with an AppLock.

member.summary: Attempts, for the specified amount of time, to acquire an exclusive application lock.
member.param: A TimeSpan representing the amount of time to wait for the lock. A value of 1 millisecond specifies an infinite wait.

member.summary: Releases the application lock.
